name: Plattformspiel
description:
This game was entirely made on Python using the pygame library. All the source code is available at my Github. This was my first ever finished game, and although it's rather simple, I am very proud of it.  Hopefully I will come up with more games in the following months, programming stuff has been a passion of mine, mainly during this pandemic time.

I am open to all sugestions of improvement. I hope you have a good time - as much as I did while coding it. <3

Here are the credits for the three songs I used in this little game of mine:

Loneliness:

Space Oddity (8-Bits):

Naruto - Sadness and Sorrow 8 Bit:
